It unclear altered expression trace change plasma protein level . We measure plasma level MMPs tissue inhibitor ( TIMPs ) patient rotator cuff tear . Material method : Blood sample collect 17 patient , median 61 ( range 39-77 ) year , sonographically verified rotator cuff tear ( partial- full-thickness ) . These compare 16 gender age match control person sonographically intact rotator cuff . Plasma level MMPs TIMPs measure simultaneously use Luminex technology .
